snap(-10,-10,20)


sky(174,195,185)
fog(177,214,210)
ground(140,174,182)
polys(124,160,171)

fadefrom(6000)
density(7)

name(Iceberg)
nlaps(3)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)p
chk(40,0,7400,0)
set(14,0,10150,-90)

set(14,0,-10150,180)
set(10,0,-5600,0)

set(24,-7000,0,-90)po
set(16,-9800,0,90)p
set(15,-15400,0,90)p
set(15,-21000,0,90)p
set(34,-22000,0,90)pr

fix(41,-25800,0,-2000,90)s
set(34,-29600,0,90)pr
set(15,-31400,0,90)p
